data.name: Hyper Visualizer
data.detailed_description:
A data visualization platform that allows you to load data into graphs and navigate your graph to find new insight.
We have prepared a collection of popular graphs and set them for easy access, visualization and exploration so you can get into what matters to you and understand data in deeper levels.
We are working hard to make this app a handy tool for fellow data enthusiasts who want to skip the preparation, filtering, querying and data wrangling and immerse into data in a more meaningful way using the power of virtual reality.
This version of the app allows you to visualize CrunchBase, a database for startups, their investors, funding rounds, employees and their relationships.
We are in early development phase of this project and your feedback is highly appreciated, please leave reviews and tell us what you think after using this app.

data.short_description: A data visualization platform that allows you to load data into graphs and navigate your graph to find new insight.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Server 2013
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
